body.p: Born on November 6, 1829 in Fayette County, Kentucky. Attended Kentucky Military Institute. Attended Transylvania University. Married Mary L. Tyler on December 4, 1856. In 1860, Johnson lived in Louisville and worked as a merchant. Enlisted in the Confederate Army. Was aide-de-camp under Simon Buckner. Died on February 7, 1920 in Louisville, Kentucky.
